pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-6060:View entity types in alphabetical order
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
View entity types in alphabetical order
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText:
I think it'd be better to sort these after they've been populated with "entityName". That minimizes the amount of code we have with knowledge of "info.title" meaning something important.
So build up the array, then sort it by entityName.
